channel.title: Help me build a pc
channel.description:
i have around 400-500 usd for building a new pc, since my last desktop broke and i dont really enjoy using a laptop at home, i dont need a monitor, neither a mouse or a keyboard, just the pc itself.
Also where can i buy a good mountain bike? I'm thinking about starting on bike trials..

item.title: Help me build a pc
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:2, topic:533591”]The IT guy at my brother’s work is giving me a list of computer parts in a couple of days at around the same price range. I’ll send it to you if you’d like. As for the mountain bike, I just bought a Haro F3 for around campus, it’s not a mountain bike, but from what I’ve come to understand Diamondback makes the most desirable mountain bikes.[/quote]Yes i’d appreciate that and thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Help me build a pc
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

The IT guy at my brother’s work is giving me a list of computer parts in a couple of days at around the same price range. I’ll send it to you if you’d like. As for the mountain bike, I just bought a Haro F3 for around campus, it’s not a mountain bike, but from what I’ve come to understand Diamondback makes the most desirable mountain bikes.

Read full topic
